A year in..It's very useful and needed. However falls short in so many ways. I am looking forward to this being more developed. It lags all the time like dialup just to open things. It doesn't update my calendar when my assistant enters things on her end. It should have a way to see the month calendar at a glance and not have to push every day. It should have ability to have different colors for different kinds of services for that day and have personal time. Ability to link to a calendar.
